status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5mto3","text":"Prepare 10g of sample and resuspend it in 90ml of saline solution (0.85% NaCl). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3frtp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fk1c9","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"kt9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"30DBD9E0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"soil sample","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"42589600AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"1","unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"90","guid":"45B49CD0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"saline solution","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"42589600AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"1","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1prkj","text":"Subject suspension to decimal dilutions in saline solution (see Guidelines), prepare at least 5 levels. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0v3c","text":"After sample preparation, dispense 10ml of TPGY broth into tubes (number of tubes depends on the number of samples multiplied by prepared dilutions, each tube corresponds to examined level). Transfer 1ml of each dilution to tubes with dispensed and preregenerated TPGY broth. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6t9sa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"76pg8","text":"    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":2,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a34un","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fblaf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","guid":"58951230AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"TPGY media","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"B863DAD0AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"3","unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","guid":"6BA91AB0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"diluted sample","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"B863DAD0AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"3","unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dmchb","text":"Subject the samples to pasteurization process at 70°C for 15 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ampau","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bjt23","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bebnp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"837E54C0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"pasteurization","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"C171AA30AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"4","temperature":"70","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"91512640AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","start":null,"step_guid":"C171AA30AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"4"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3r4t","text":"Incubate inoculated tubes at 30°C or 37°C for 48h, under anaerobic conditions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"avi9b","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"duge9","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b7jcr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9AA610C0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"anaerobic incubation ","protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","step_guid":"CA06EE30AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"5","temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"A8AAC7B0AD0F11E9B0182D7134991306","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"protocol_name":"Determination of Clostridium sp. contamination level","start":null,"step_guid":"CA06EE30AD0E11E9B0182D7134991306","step_number":"5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cfbi3","text":" After incubation check the turbidity of TPGY and the ability to gas production. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d5q56","text":"Spread 10µl of liquid culture onto surfaces of FAA and Willis–Hobbs agar media. Incubate inoculated plates at 37°C for 48h, under anaerobic conditions.
